YOU'RE INVITED
Congratulations! Based on BlueWave's performance rankings of all of our installer partners, {!Account.Name} has achieved our highest standards, including the following accomplishments:
Conversion Rates >80% 0 Customer issues regarding installation quality Regular use of BlueWave loan products
Based on your performance, we would like to invite you to become a top-tier "Loyal Blue" partner eligible to sell Community Solar.
Why offer Community Solar?
Re-Connect with leads who did not follow through with rooftop installations Offer "one-stop-solar" for new leads Top-off eligible solar loan customers for 100% solar power Earn up to $1,500 in commission per lead closed
Additional Loyal Blue Benefits:
Event Sponsorship: Co-Exhibiting at key industry events Exclusive Sales Perks: Think tickets to March Madness 2018 Training: Subsidies available for your team And more..!
Interested? Talk to your BlueWave partner about signing a Sales Service Agreement (SSA) to unlock the ability to sell Community Solar to customers.
Thanks for working with BlueWave to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere.
- All of us here at BlueWave
